member.name: T:VBScripting.SpeechSynthesis
member.summary: Provide a wrapper for the .Net speech synthesizer for VBScript, for demonstration purposes.

member.name: M:VBScripting.SpeechSynthesis.Speak(System.String)
member.summary:
Convert text to speech.
This method is synchronous.

member.name: M:VBScripting.SpeechSynthesis.SpeakAsync(System.String)
member.summary:
Convert text to speech.
This method is asynchronous.

Each element of the array can be used to set

member.name: P:VBScripting.SpeechSynthesis.Voice
member.summary:
Gets or sets the current voice by name.
A string. One of the names from the Voices array.

member.name: P:VBScripting.SpeechSynthesis.SynthesizerState
member.summary:
Gets the state of the SpeechSynthesizer.
Read only. Returns an integer equal to one of the method return values.

member.name: P:VBScripting.SpeechSynthesis.Volume
member.summary:
Gets or sets the volume.
An integer from 0 to 100.

member.name: P:VBScripting.SpeechSynthesis.State
member.summary: Provides an object whose methods (Ready, Paused, and Speaking) provide return values useful in VBScript for comparing to .

member.name: T:VBScripting.SynthesizerState
member.summary:
C# enum not intended for use by VBScript.
Corresponds to but not equivalent to System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState.
